H0.text: A 'Loganberry' is a cross between two berries, name either. Blueberry

H1.text: A 'Loganberry' is a cross between two berries, name either. Cranberry

H2.text: A 'Loganberry' is a cross between two berries, name either. Elderberry

H3.text: A 'Loganberry' is a cross between two berries, name either. RASPBERRY or BLACKBERRY

A4.text: The loganberry is a hybrid of the North American blackberry (Rubus ursinus) and the European raspberry (Rubus idaeus)
